languages.text: "Кто-то хотел скрыть причину смерти. Но странно после этого оставлять труп на видном месте, а не избавиться от тела".
"Someone wanted to hide the cause of death. What I fail to understand is why they would then leave the body out in the open instead of disposing of it."
languages.original_text: "Кто-то хотел скрыть причину смерти. Но странно после этого оставлять труп на видном месте, а не избавиться от тела".

traits.locale_text: "Someone wanted to hide the cause of death. What I fail to understand is why they would then leave the body out in the open instead of disposing of it."
"Someone wanted to hide the cause of death. What I fail to understand is why they would then leave the body out in the open instead of disposing of it."
"Someone wanted to hide the cause of death. What I fail to understand is why they would then leave the body out in the open instead of disposing of it."
"Someone wanted to hide the cause of death. What I fail to understand is why they would then leave the body out in the open instead of disposing of it."
"Someone wanted to hide the cause of death. What I fail to understand is why they would then leave the body out in the open instead of disposing of it."
"Someone wanted to hide the cause of death. What I fail to understand is why they would then leave the body out in the open instead of disposing of it."

languages.text: « De toute évidence, quelqu'un tenait à maquiller la cause de sa mort. Ce qui m'échappe, c'est la raison pour laquelle l'assassin a abandonné le corps à la vue de tous au lieu de s'en débarrasser discrètement. »
languages.original_text: "Someone wanted to hide the cause of death. What I fail to understand is why they would then leave the body out in the open instead of disposing of it."

traits.locale_text: « De toute évidence, quelqu'un tenait à maquiller la cause de sa mort. Ce qui m'échappe, c'est la raison pour laquelle l'assassin a abandonné le corps à la vue de tous au lieu de s'en débarrasser discrètement. »

languages.text: «Alguien quería ocultar la causa de la muerte. Lo que no entiendo es por qué, entonces, dejaron el cuerpo al descubierto en lugar de deshacerse de él».
languages.original_text: "Someone wanted to hide the cause of death. What I fail to understand is why they would then leave the body out in the open instead of disposing of it."

traits.locale_text: «Alguien quería ocultar la causa de la muerte. Lo que no entiendo es por qué, entonces, dejaron el cuerpo al descubierto en lugar de deshacerse de él».

languages.text: “凶手打算隐瞒受害者的死因，但我不明白的是：凶手为什么没有处理掉尸体，而是把它放在了这里？”
languages.original_text: "Someone wanted to hide the cause of death. What I fail to understand is why they would then leave the body out in the open instead of disposing of it."

traits.locale_text: “凶手打算隐瞒受害者的死因，但我不明白的是：凶手为什么没有处理掉尸体，而是把它放在了这里？”

languages.text: 「誰かが死因を隠そうとしている。しかし、それならなぜ遺体を捨てずに放置していたのかが理解出来ない」
languages.original_text: "Someone wanted to hide the cause of death. What I fail to understand is why they would then leave the body out in the open instead of disposing of it."

traits.locale_text: 「誰かが死因を隠そうとしている。しかし、それならなぜ遺体を捨てずに放置していたのかが理解出来ない」

languages.text: "Jemand wollte die Todesursache verschleiern. Ich verstehe nur nicht, warum er den Leichnam dann offen liegen lässt, anstatt ihn zu entsorgen."
languages.original_text: "Someone wanted to hide the cause of death. What I fail to understand is why they would then leave the body out in the open instead of disposing of it."

traits.locale_text: "Jemand wollte die Todesursache verschleiern. Ich verstehe nur nicht, warum er den Leichnam dann offen liegen lässt, anstatt ihn zu entsorgen."

languages.text: "Birisi ölüm nedenini saklamak istemiş. Anlayamadığım kısım ise cesetten kurtulmak yerine neden onu böyle ortalıkta bıraktığı."
languages.original_text: "Someone wanted to hide the cause of death. What I fail to understand is why they would then leave the body out in the open instead of disposing of it."
